title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 June 01 SU [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Sunday, 01 June 2014


[sebaygo1]

Show description from theweb site :: On this Sunday, June 1 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex interviews several guests on a variety of current events now shaping the world. 

Larry Pratt, the Executive Director of Gun Owners of America, reveals the current state of the Second Amendment and how anti-gun activists are trying to blame gun owners - and white males - for the recent Santa Barbara shootings and stabbings. 

Dr. Paul Craig Roberts, former Assistant Secretary of the Treasury under the Reagan Administration and a prolific writer, breaks down Obama's delusional speech at West Point as well as the latest geopolitical developments. 

Investigative journalist and best-selling author Jon Rappoport explains how the elite's monolithic control of the news is now in decline due to the explosion of alternative media. 

Psychological warfare expert and best-selling author Dr. Steve Pieczenik elaborates on his correct prediction that NSA whistleblower Edward Snowden wasn't just a computer technician but rather served as an operational asset for the intelligence community, which Snowden himself has confirmed.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
